name: Sheikh Muhammad Affan
bio: Muhammad Affan is an aspiring Full Stack developer with extensive expertise in Front end development. He's a fun and friendly person to be around.  When it comes to sports, Affan likes to play table tennis, and computer games. With a blend of both technical and creative skills, he is always eager to learn new technologies and frameworks. He is a team player and always ready to help his team members. He is a quick learner and always ready to take on new challenges. He is a big thinker and always imagines how technology can make Pakistan better in the future. He is on a mission to make sure technology plays a big role in making Pakistan a better place.
